rules_text:
Aurora [i](At your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
Flying, haste
As long as your aurora has three or more colors, this creature gets +1/+1 and has menace.
flavor_text: [i]“They're mindless on this plane too, I think.” Eiyo sighed. Alexa wondered if that was lonely.[/i]
